snippet.title: Gordon Ramsay's Chef Blast
snippet.description:
Play Chef Blast: https://chef-blast.onelink.me/seQE/chefblast

Blast your way through Gordon Ramsay's puzzle game! Tap matching cubes to blast them to smithereens and cook up a storm! Customize your kitchen as you progress through the game, earn game cash by completing levels and spend it to renovate your kitchen.

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and become a top chef through mouth-watering levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius!

Turn a kitchen nightmare into your dream kitchen as you solve puzzles and progress through levels with Gordon!

Choose from 200+ upgrades across unique themes to customize all aspects of your kitchen. Complete a theme or mix and match upgrades as you design and decorate a unique in-app kitchen. Earn game cash for completing levels and spend it on kitchen upgrades and customizations.

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive Gordon Ramsay dishes, including an exclusive holiday recipe - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of Gordon’s personal all-time favorites.

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest game around!

Features:

BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from Gordon Ramsay and become a master chef!

PLAY LUSCIOUS LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR KITCHEN - Personalize your kitchen as you progress through levels!

DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing recipes in your quest to conquer the kitchen!

BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more levels!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN - With challenging & strategic gameplay!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!

TEAM UP - With friends and other players to send and receive lives!

TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become the best in the Chef Blast world!

PICK UP AND PLAY - Anytime, anyplace, even offline!

_____

Enjoying Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast? Learn more:

Follow us:
Facebook: https://facebook.com/ChefBlast/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chefblastofficial/


Visit us:
www.outplay.com

_____

Name, voice, image, and likeness of Gordon Ramsay provided under license from Humble Pie Media Limited for Studio Ramsay. Gordon Ramsay is a trade mark or registered trademark of Gordon Ramsay. All Rights Reserved.

Culinary Genius © & TM Humble Pie Rights Ltd 2017-2021


© 2020-2021, Outplay Entertainment Limited. All rights reserved.
